sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' interface rating{ value: number; text:string; } const Rating = (props: rating) => { return (

{props.value}

{props.text}

= 1 ? 'fas fa-star' : props.value >= 0.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' :'fas fa-star' }> = 2 ? 'fas fa-star' : props.value >= 1.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' :'fas fa-star' }> = 3 ? 'fas fa-star' : props.value >= 2.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' :'fas fa-star' }> = 4 ? 'fas fa-star' : props.value >= 3.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' :'fas fa-star' }> = 5 ? 'fas fa-star' : props.value >= 4.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' :'fas fa-star' }> {props.text ? props.text : ''}{/*if there is text display it else vide--{props.text ? props.text : ''}--*/}
) } export default Rating
